metadata.title: USN-6487-1 -- Avahi vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Evgeny Vereshchagin discovered that Avahi contained several reachable  assertions, which could lead to intentional assertion failures when  specially crafted user input was given. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2023-38469, CVE-2023-38470, CVE-2023-38471, CVE-2023-38472, CVE-2023-38473)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6487-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libavahi-compat-libdnssd-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-ui-gtk3-0 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-qt4-1 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-core7 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-client3 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-core-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-client-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 avahi-ui-utils - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-gobject-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 avahi-dnsconfd - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-compat-libdnssd1 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-common3 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 avahi-daemon - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 avahi-discover - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-common-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-common-data - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 avahi-utils - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-ui0 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-ui-gtk3-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-glib-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-ui-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-qt4-dev - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-gobject0 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 avahi-autoipd - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 python-avahi - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 libavahi-glib1 - 0.6.32~rc+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
